meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or shock.
meanings.sent1: Blimy! I didn't expect to see you here.
meanings.sent3: Blimy, I almost dropped my ice cream when I saw that!
meanings.sent4: The sudden thunder made me shout 'blimy!'
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick left the audience shouting 'blimy!'

meanings.sent1: He let out a blimy when he stubbed his toe.
meanings.sent2: The children giggled at the use of the word blimy.
meanings.sent3: The old man's favorite blimy made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The blimy echoed through the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The chef's blimy was heard all the way to the kitchen.
